item.description:
For those who are new to LARPing in General or have never LARPed old world of darkness, there will be premade characters available if you would like.

If you don't mind a drive (luckily, not a terribly long one), we are running an independent old world of darkness camarilla vampire LARP that generally takes place in Groton, CT on the fourth Saturday of every month. On May 21st, in preparation for CONNECTICON 2011 - we are holding an event game at the Connecticon Member's Center in Newington, CT. We always have room for more players. Email EdgeOfDarknessLARP@gmail.com for more details‚Äù
item.why: We are an independent Old World of Darkness LARP that takes place in Southeastern Connecticut. For those of you looking for a new roleplaying experience, or those of you who have larped Mind's Eye Theatre before, come check us out!
item.name: Edge of Darkness Old World LARP *EVENT GAME*
